Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Lake
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Lake due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 103rd, Halsted, 107th, Vincennes and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.
